events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the tooltip's open state changes.
events.description_zh: 在工具提示的打开状态更改时调用的处理程序。

events.name: shouldCloseOnInteractOutside
events.description: When user interacts with the argument element outside of the tooltip ref, return true if onClose should be called. This gives you a chance to filter out interaction with elements that should not dismiss the tooltip. By default, onClose will always be called on interaction outside the overlay ref.
events.description_zh: 当用户与工具提示引用外部的参数元素交互时，如果应调用 onClose，则返回 true。这使你有机会筛选出与不应消除工具提示的元素的交互。默认情况下，onClose 将始终在覆盖 ref 外部的交互时调用。

events.name: onClose
events.description: Handler that is called when the tooltip should close.
events.description_zh: 在工具提示应关闭时调用的处理程序。

:children.description: The children to render. Usually a trigger element.
:children.description_zh: 要呈现的子项。通常是一个触发元素。

:content.description: The content to render inside the tooltip.
:content.description_zh: 要在工具提示中呈现的内容。

size.description: The tooltip size. This change the `content` font size.
size.description_zh: 工具提示大小。这将更改“内容”字体大小。

placement.description: The placement of the tooltip relative to its trigger reference.
placement.description_zh: 工具提示相对于其触发器引用的位置。

:delay.description: The delay in milliseconds before the tooltip opens.
:delay.description_zh: 工具提示打开前的延迟（以毫秒为单位）。

:closeDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds before the tooltip closes.
:closeDelay.description_zh: 工具提示关闭前的延迟（以毫秒为单位）。

isOpen.description: Whether the tooltip is open by default (controlled).
isOpen.description_zh: 默认情况下，工具提示是否处于打开状态（受控）。

defaultOpen.description: Whether the tooltip is open by default (uncontrolled).
defaultOpen.description_zh: 默认情况下工具提示是否处于打开状态（不受控制）。

:offset.description: The distance or margin between the reference and popper. It is used internally to create an offset modifier.
:offset.description_zh: 参照和波普尔之间的距离或边距。它在内部用于创建偏移修饰符。

:containerPadding.description: The placement padding that should be applied between the element and its surrounding container.
:containerPadding.description_zh: 应在元素与其周围容器之间应用的放置填充。

:crossOffset.description: The additional offset applied along the cross axis between the element and its anchor element.
:crossOffset.description_zh: 沿元素与其锚点元素之间的横轴应用的附加偏移。

triggerType.description: Type of tooltip that is opened by the trigger.
triggerType.description_zh: 触发器打开的工具提示的类型。

showArrow.description: Whether the tooltip should have an arrow.
showArrow.description_zh: 工具提示是否应具有箭头。

shouldFlip.description: Whether the tooltip should change its placement and flip when it's about to overflow its boundary area.
shouldFlip.description_zh: 工具提示是否应更改其位置并在即将溢出其边界区域时翻转。

triggerScaleOnOpen.description: Whether the trigger should scale down when the tooltip is open.
triggerScaleOnOpen.description_zh: 当工具提示打开时，触发器是否应按比例缩小。

shouldBlockScroll.description: Whether to block scrolling outside the tooltip.
shouldBlockScroll.description_zh: 是否阻止在工具提示外滚动。

isKeyboardDismissDisabled.description: Whether pressing the escape key to close the tooltip should be disabled.
isKeyboardDismissDisabled.description_zh: 是否应禁用按 Escape 键关闭工具提示。

isDismissable.description: Whether to close the overlay when the user interacts outside it.
isDismissable.description_zh: 当用户在覆盖层外部交互时，是否关闭覆盖层。

shouldCloseOnBlur.description: Whether the tooltip should close when focus is lost or moves outside it.
shouldCloseOnBlur.description_zh: 当焦点丢失或移出焦点时，工具提示是否应关闭。

:motionProps.description: The props to modify the framer motion animation. Use the `variants` API to create your own animation.
:motionProps.description_zh: 用于修改成帧器运动动画的道具。使用“变体”API 创建您自己的动画。

portalContainer.description: The container element in which the overlay portal will be placed.
portalContainer.description_zh: 将在其中放置覆盖门户的容器元素。

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the tooltip slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为工具提示槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: The main tooltip slot, it wraps the tooltip content.
slots.description_zh: 主工具提示槽，它包装工具提示内容。

slots.name: arrow
slots.description: The arrow slot, it wraps the tooltip arrow, the placement of the arrow is based on the tooltip placement, e.g. data-[placement=top]:....
slots.description_zh: 箭头槽，它包裹工具提示箭头，箭头的位置基于工具提示的位置，例如 data-[placement=top]：....
